desc: JOOB – sustainable and stylish activewear that can be worn wherever adventure takes you. JOOB is for those who put themselves out there. Designed in the US, with fair trade and sustainable sources across the globe. A 1% for the Planet and Climate Neutral Certified Company.

layout.text: We are taking a slow fashion approach to design, only bringing products to market that fill a gap in what’s out there today and not rushing to meet a season’s sales goals. Photo: @andrewfitts
